Text: Many thanks for this, your latest awesome contribution. As always I will seed to a ratio of 10:1. Just had to increase my drives to 2TB just to keep up with those very kind people, such as yourself, who so generously share. Be well. T.
welcome guys and thanks for leaving a comment.
Thanks for sharing your awesome collection. Do you have a copy of The Big Lie by The Lover Speaks? There was another torrent, but it's dead and I can't find it anywhere...

Dear 80zforever. Just to let you know how much I appreciate your great work! Thank you for your 80z music archeology, and especially for Umbrella by The Crystal Set - a band I never heard of, that brings me to tears. Thank you!!
roskiller, i am glad you found some new "old" band lol enjoy it man, enjoy it!
I love The Crystal Set. It took me some efforts many moons ago to get that CD.
